translations: 装零碎杂物的容器；<美>椅子背罩（tidy 的复数）
整理，收拾（tidy 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: She tidies the bookshelf by herself.
After bringing the letter to his cousin, Peter comes back home and tidies up his room.
sentences.translation: 把信带给堂兄以后，彼得回家收拾他的房间。

sentences.sentence: Those cardboard tubes make terrific cable tidies!
sentences.translation: 这些纸板管制造出了了不起的线缆收齐器！
